entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
